dempred.datastructure

Class DatasetReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • dempred.datastructure.DatasetReader

  • public class DatasetReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DatasetReader is a simple class containing functions to read a dataset from various sources such as text files.

    • Method Detail

      • readFromCVS

        public static Dataset<Datapoint> readFromCVS(java.io.File file)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Read from .cvs. A simple function used to read a basic dataset from a comma separated file. The format of the dataset has to be as follows: comment, Group (class), Value, Weight, f1, f2 f3, ...fn Lines can be commented using a '#' sign. These lines will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        the dataset
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
